API overview

Overview of API

This is a simple CRUD API designed to be implemented into a front end later on
The table below will tell you about all our inside methods and how they work.

Method Route Functionality Response
GET / This is the first page that will generate when someone logs into the node server Shows you this page.... if it works correctly
GET /Users This request will show all users in the in memory array
Post /Users This request will allow you to add a in memory JSON object
Patch /Users/:userID This request will allow you to update a user ID Will send a JSON object of the requested userID that you can use to update an exhisting user
Delete /Users/:userID This request will allow you to delete a user based on userID You will see a message saying the user has been deleted along wiht a status code for confirmation
GET /Users/:userID This request will allow you to see the selected user in the user array You will see the requested user along with there userID firstName lastName and emaila address
